Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is slightly ribbed, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of three lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394198) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394198)
